snippet: April 15 is a good day to reflect on how much you pay in taxes and what you receive in return. It’s also good to think about how your tax rate compares with what the private equity industry pays.
abstract: April 15 is a good day to reflect on how much you pay in taxes and what you receive in return. It’s also good to think about how your tax rate compares with what the private equity industry pays.
